title: Question 21
prompt: Vince and his father urged <u>there neighbors</u> to clean the front lawn and to throw all garbage in the proper bins.
description: Read the sentences and look at the underlined parts. Choose the answer that is written correctly for each underlined part.
feedback: The correct answer is “their neighbors.” The word “their” means belonging to them. The sentence is describing the neighbors of Vince and his father, so “their” is appropriate. “They’re” means “they are.” The words “they are” wouldn’t make sense in the sentence. The word “there” describes a location, as in “over there.” It also doesn’t make sense in the sentence.
